name: Walking
comments: Walking is something you can do anywhere, anytime, with no equipment other than a good pair of shoes.

name: Bent-over Row
comments: Talk about bang for the buck: This exercise works all the major muscles of the upper back, as well as the biceps.

name: Lungs exercise
comments: A lunge is a great exercise because it mimics life, it mimics walking

name: Interval training
comments: Adding interval training to your cardiovascular workout will boost your fitness level .

name: Squarts-training
comments: our experts tended to favor strength-training exercises that target multiple muscle groups. Squats, which work the quadriceps, hamstrings, and gluteals, are an excellent example.

name: Push-ups
comments: If done correctly, the push-up can strengthen the chest, shoulders, triceps, and even the core trunk muscles, all at one time.
